```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(stats)
library(graphics)
library(readxl)
library(psych)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r}
datos <- read_excel("lenguado.xlsx")
summary(datos)
str(datos)
head(datos)
```
```{r}
read_xlsx("lenguado.xlsx")
datos$id<- as.factor(datos$id)
datos$peso<- as.factor(datos$peso)
```
```{r}
table(datos$peso)
table (datos$talla)
ggplot(datos, aes(x = weight)) +
  geom_histogram()
ggplot(datos, aes(x = weight)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(color = datos))
ggplot(datos, aes(x = weight)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(color = datos), 
  position = "identity", bins = 30, alpha = 0.4

```
